did.head: Collection Summary
did.unittitle: Cartoons Published in the Arizona Daily Star, 1957-1961
did.abstract: This collection consists of a scrapbook of newspaper clippings of Ellinwood's cartoons, chiefly political and cowboy cartoons, published in the Arizona Daily Star from July 9, 1957 to Oct. 21, 1961.

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on this collection.

prefercite.head: Credit Line
prefercite.p: Cartoons Published in the Arizona Daily Star (AZ 084). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Acquired as gift of David Brinegar, 1962.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Scrapbook of newspaper clippings of Ellinwood's cartoons, chiefly political and cowboy cartoons, published in the Arizona Daily Star from July 9, 1957 to Oct. 21, 1961. Also included are related newspaper clippings about Ellinwood.

item.geogname: United States -- Politics and government -- Caricatures and cartoons.
